statements: DELETE FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM flood_prone_areas WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY'
DELETE FROM properties WHERE id = 100 AND address = '123 Main St';
DELETE FROM flooding_impacts WHERE area_id = 200 AND impact_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level = 'High' AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM FloodProneAreas WHERE id = 1 AND risk_level > 5;
DELETE FROM Properties WHERE property_value < 100000 OR property_name LIKE 'Villa%';
